textBeforeTable: Research --> Chad Report This annual report focuses on the efforts of U.S. trade beneficiary countries and territories to eliminate the worst forms of child labor through legislation, enforcement mechanisms, policies and social programs.   Findings on the Worst Forms of Child Labor Featured Zimbabwe Western Sahara West Bank & the Gaza Strip Wallis & Futuna Venezuela Vanuatu Tuvalu Turks & Caicos Islands Tunisia Tokelau Tonga South Sudan Somalia Solomon Islands Seychelles Serbia Samoa Saint Helena St. Vincent & Grenadines Saint Lucia Saint Kitts & Nevis Norfolk Island Niue Montserrat Montenegro Mauritius Mauritania Macedonia Kiribati Iraq Grenada Gibraltar Georgia The Gambia Fiji Falkland Islands (Islas Malvinas) Eritrea Dominica Djibouti Cook Islands Cocos Islands Christmas Island Chad Central African Republic Bosnia & Herzegovina Bhutan Armenia Anguilla Algeria
